titles.title: A resolution to designate May 22, 2014 as "United States Foreign Service Day" in recognition of the men and women who have served, or are presently serving, in the Foreign Service of the United States, and to honor those in the Foreign Service who have given their lives in the line of duty.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
3/4/2014--Introduced. Honors the men and women who have served, or are presently serving, in the Foreign Service for their dedicated and important service to country.
Designates May 22, 2014, as United States Foreign Service Day to commemorate the 90th anniversary of the Foreign Service.
